name: Halloween Adventure
description:
This game is originally made for mobile phone for free (available on google store), but i just feel like to share it here.

Sorry if there is GUI button while you play the game, like i said this game was made for mobile phone. and there are some function that will not work in the PC version like achievement, and add health function while in game and remove ads button.

Sorry for the inconvenient since i'm new in game development. 

here's the control for the game:

  • left = "A"
  • right = "D"
  • jump = "Space"
  • attack = "L" 
  • Back / Pause = "Backspace"
  • Exit = "Esc"
  • Also you can use your mouse's left click to select most of the GUI button.

Ok, short description of this game:

The mission of this Halloween Adventure Horror Game is to go to your nearest neighbour to ask for trick or treat. But your journey is not as easy as it sound like. On your journey, you'll face so many obstacles, zombies, and other creatures. All you have with you during the journey is an infinite number of pumpkin, Luckily the pumpkin can destroy the enemy, therefore use the pumpkin to keep them away.

Play this game to know more... and good luck finding your nearest neighbour. :) 

Halloween Adventure Horror Game Features:
- Stylish and retro pixel art graphics!
- Exciting and nerve wrecking challenging level.
